name: Hong Kong International Conference on Education, Psychology and Society
content: Organized by Higher Education Forum (HEF), Hong Kong International Conference on Education, Psychology and Society (HKICEPS) is an international platform for scholars, researchers and practitioners to discuss interdisciplinary research and practices in the fields of Education, Psychology and Society and more. 2018 HKICEPS will take place from January 22-24, 2018 in Hong Kong. Prospective authors are invited to submit original research abstracts or full papers which were not, are not and have not been submitted/published/under consideration in other conferences and journals.
